text: Lightbournus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Lightbournus include: * Lightbournus russjenseni Lyons & Snyder, 2008 ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Lightbournus
